drawing_dim_t draw::drawing_dim ( drawing_size_t  w,
drawing_size_t  h 
)

This returns a drawing_dim_t populated with the width and height.

Parameters

hHeight of the retured data
Returns
A drawing_dim_t with w and h populated as specified
